author: ryanm124
body:
Updated version of the displaced vertex producer presented at L1 DPG: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1408668/contributions/5920520/attachments/2850847/4984793/Displaced%20Vertexing%20Low%20Fake%20DP%20Note.pdf

DP Note: https://cds.cern.ch/record/2901311?ln=en

Model file used for displaced track quality is in seperate PR to cms-data: https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-TrackTrigger/pull/4
Model file for displaced vertexing GBDT: https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TTrackMatch/pull/2
title: Displaced vertexing gbdt
